name: companyHashedUrl
label: Company Hashed URL
help: Hashed LinkedIn URL of the company in Sales Navigator

name: retrieveEmployees
label: Retrieve Employees
help: Whether to retrieve company employees information

name: employeeLimit
label: Employee Limit
help: Maximum number of employees to retrieve (max 500). Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: firstName
label: Employee First Name
help: First name of employee to filter by. Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: lastName
label: Employee Last Name
help: Last name of employee to filter by. Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: positions
label: Employee Positions
help: Job position names to filter by. Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: locations
label: Employee Locations
help: Employee locations to filter by. Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: industries
label: Employee Industries
help: Employee industries to filter by. Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: schools
label: Employee Schools
help: Schools attended by employees to filter by. Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: yearsOfExperiences
label: Years of Experience
help: Years of professional experience ranges to filter by. Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: retrieveDMs
label: Retrieve Decision Makers
help: Whether to retrieve company decision makers information

name: dmsLimit
label: Decision Makers Limit
help: Number of decision makers to retrieve (max 20). Only used when Retrieve Decision Makers is enabled
